articles.author: Mike Fitzpatrick
articles.title: Blue Jays beat Yankees 5-2 in Game 4 to reach first ALCS since 2016 - AP News
articles.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. and George Springer each drove in a run, and eight Toronto pitchers shut down the New York Yankees in a 5-2 victory that sent the Blue Jays to the American League Championship Series for the first time in nine years. Nathan Lukes provide…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) After taking down the storied New York Yankees in their own ballpark, Toronto manager John Schneider was ready to revel in the triumph.
Start spreading the news! Schneider exclaimed wh… [+5925 chars]
